mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(SEQ, ID, PWD, NAME, NICKNAME, BIRTH, GENDER, PHONE, ADDRESS1, EMAIL, JOINDATE, AUTH) VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{address1}, #{email}, SYSDATE, 0)
